title: Ticket #7787: Improve ProportionalSetSizeKb attribute
description: The attribute ProportionalSetSizeKb acts mostly like ResidentSetSize, with two notable differences. First, it's not advertised in the slot ad by default (i.e. it's not in SYSTEM_STARTD_JOB_ATTRS). Second, the starter advertises the current value from the OS, not the max over the lifetime of the current job process family.
check_ins:
2020-Sep-28 15:56   Check-in [61353]: Docs for ProportionalSetSizeKb improvements in the slot ad. #7787 (By Jaime Frey )
2020-Aug-05 22:44   Check-in [60392]: Treat ProportionalSetSizeKb more like ResidentSetSize. #7787 Advertise it in the slot ad by default and have the starter track the max value for the current run. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
